price: Ал эми, бактысыз адамдар Тозокто! Анда алардын (жүрөк үшүткөн) өкүрүк-бакырыктары бар.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُواْ فَفِي ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَشَهِيقٌ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna shaqū fafī al-nāri lahum fīhā zafīrun washahīqun
